meanings.definition: The state of not being available.
meanings.sent1: The unavailability of the book at the library disappointed the students.
meanings.sent2: The unavailability of parking spaces made it difficult to find a spot.
meanings.sent3: The unavailability of snacks at the party left everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her unavailability during the meeting was like a missing puzzle piece.
meanings.sent5: The unavailability of water in the desert was life-threatening.

meanings.definition: The quality of not being accessible or obtainable.
meanings.sent1: The unavailability of the product online led to customer complaints.
meanings.sent2: The unavailability of the key delayed the opening of the store.
meanings.sent3: His unavailability for the interview caused a lot of confusion.
meanings.sent4: The unavailability of time felt like a constant struggle.
meanings.sent5: The unavailability of the rare gem made it even more desirable.
